text: Anthony R. Dolan (born July 7, 1948 died March 11, 2025) is an American Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist. He was a speechwriter for President Ronald Reagan from March 1981 until the end of Reagan's second term in 1989.Appointment of Anthony R. Dolan as Special Assistant to the President and Chief Speechwriter, UCSB American Presidency Project, November 17, 1981 ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from Connecticut Category:People from Norwalk, Connecticut
title: Anthony R. Dolan
